property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Planes only. When the upgraded character attacks or defends -> Look at the top card of your deck. You may scrap it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is on Bumblebee and he attacks -> Draw a card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Ranged Character -> Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap your hand. Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your characters gets +1 Attack until end of turn for each Upgrade on it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: After the upgraded character defends -> Scrap this card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. Tough 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an enemy character. Move 1 damage counter from each of your Planes to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play an Action. Then you may play another Action.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Insecticons only. When the upgraded character is KO'd -> Draw a card, scrap an enemy Upgrade, and your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Trucks only. The upgraded character has +1 Attack for each Cargo Trailer on it. Up to 3 Cargo Trailers can fit in its Utility slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player chooses a Weapon on one of their characters and scraps it. Each player chooses a card in their hand and scraps it

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character has a Weapon -> It has Bold 1. While the upgraded chracter has an Armor -> It has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and scraps the rest.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Utility. If you can't, draw a card. Pierce 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Tanks only. The upgraded character has Pierce equal to its armor.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attack and you flip an equal number of [O] and [B] -> Each of those [B] adds to its attack total.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> Draw a card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Draw a card. Then you may put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Return one of the defending chracter's Upgrades to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap your hand. One of your Dinobots gets Bold 5 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Return all Upgrades on a character to their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and scap an Upgrade from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and scap an Action from it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Armor. If you can't, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If you have more * of characters in your KO area than you have on the battlefield, repair 2 more damage from that character.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on damaged characters only. Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card for each of your Upgrades.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage -> Instead scrap this card andthe upgraded character takes 4 damage.

property.name: Type

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is on Megatron -> He has Pierce 3.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: After the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: If any of your other characters would take attack damage -> Instead the upgraded character takes that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Tank mode. Then, for each of your Tanks that isn't upgraded with an Amor, put an Armor on it from your scape pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Return one of your KO'd characters that has 12 * or fewer to the battlefield and repair 1 damage from it. At the end of turn, KO it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 3 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Optimus Prime only.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +3 Attack until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text

card.name: One Shall Stand, One Shall Fall

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters and an enemy character. Do 3 damage to each of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may KO one of your characters that has 6 * or more. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.value: Do 2 damage to EACH character.

property.name: Text

property.value: Do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Untap one of your characters that has 10 * or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap ALL Upgrades. Repair 1 damage from each character for each Upgrade scrapped from it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Weapon. If you can't, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player reveals their hands and scraps all upgrades from it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends and you flip an equal number of [B] and [O] -> Each of those [O] adds to its Armor total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Car mode. Then untap one of your Cars.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is NOT Ironhide and it attacks -> Do 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets Bold 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Untap one of your tapped characters. Then tap one of your untapped characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose 2 of your characters. Swap all of their Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip a battle card for each insecticon you behand the game with. For each [O] you flip, your opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 1 damage to it. For each [B] you flip, repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player scraps their hand and draws 4 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. If it is a truck, repair 2 damage from it. If it is a car, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters get +2 Attack until end of turn. While it's attacking an enemy that has more stars than it, it gets Pierce 4.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is attacking -> It has pierce 1 that attack for each blue battle icon you flip.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all Upgrades scrapped this way into your hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Cars only. When you put this on a character -> untap that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your untapped Transformers can attack this turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this from your hand -> You may play Tandem Targeting System from your scrap pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Titans gets Bold 4 until end of turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take damage -> Instead your Metroplex takes that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Metroplex on the battlefield -> Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: RT 01

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has Pierce equal to her Attack.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: RT 02

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Scrap all cards from your hand. Then draw that many cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you reshuffle your deck while this is attacking -> KO the defender if it has 12 Stars or fewer.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: CT 03

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand that has at least [W]. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks or defends and you flip your first [W] this turn -> This gets +1 Power and +1 Armor until end of turn.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: UT 04

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends against an enemy that doesn't have Pierce and you flip at least [W] [W] -> This can't take more than 2 damage this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] [W] -> This gets Pierce 2 until after the attack.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: UT 05

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play an Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks for the first time each turn and you flip at least [W] [W] [W] -> Untap this.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: CT 06

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your characters gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is attacking a damaged enemy -> This has Bold 2.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: CT 07

property.name: Card Number
property.value: CT 08

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks or defends and you flip at least [W] [W] -> Flip 2 more battle cards.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: SRT 09

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This character can attack untapped enemies this turn as though they were untapped.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is your only character on the battlefield -> He has +2 Attack and +2 Armor.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: UT 10

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Scrap all Upgrades from this character. For each one scrapped this way, draw a card and repair 1 damage from each of your Insecticons.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may move an Upgrade from one of your other characters to this one.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: RT 11

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a card that has at least [W] from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] [W] -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text

property.name: Card Number
property.value: UT 15

property.name: Text

property.name: Text

property.value: UT 18

property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move 1 damage counter from this character to an enemy.

property.name: Rarity

property.name: Card Number

property.name: Text
